name: Awaken (itch) (Henry_yin)
description:
This is a 3D personal indie game which designed by a group of seven during a Game Jam organized by a community called "GameChangers"

GroupMembers:

1. Henry & Luty (Programmer)

2. Jinzhao (The team leader)

3. Flash & Tsinny & Jack (artist)

This game only has one target, that is to escape from the shop!!!!!

Currently, the destination has been set at the cashier bank. To win this game, player needs to move all of the characters to the red point on cashier bank.

Here is a brief introduction about the game mechanisms about each character we designed.

1. The Chips

For chips, there is a height limitation for falling. So always bear in mind that step on somethings (e.g. other chips lol) when you are falling from a relatively high space.

2. The sausage

For sausage,  the height of its jumping is depending on how long you hold the SPACE button. Please use this characteristic to reach some secret space!

3. The Scissors

For Scissors, it can sprint for a while after you holding the SHIFT button. So it has the highest agility. Be wise on using this feature!

Last but no least, hope you guys can enjoy this game!
